mapper.select: SELECT t_find.information, t_find.user_id, t_user.userName, t_user.id, t_show.show_name, t_show.show_img, t_show.show_place, t_show.show_max_price, t_find.find_id, t_show.show_id FROM t_find INNER JOIN t_user ON t_find.user_id = t_user.id INNER JOIN t_show ON t_find.show_id = t_show.show_id WHERE t_find.show_id=#{show_id}
